verses.verse: <S%G3326>After<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G5563>departed<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G116>Athens,<s%> and <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2882>Corinth.<s%>

<S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G2147>found<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G2453>Jew<s%> <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G207>Aquila,<s%> a man of <S%G4193>Pontus<s%> by <S%G1085>race,<s%> who had <S%G4373>recently<s%> <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2482>Italy,<s%> <S%G2532>with<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1135>wife<s%> <S%G4252>Priscilla,<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> <S%G2804>Claudius<s%> had <S%G1299>commanded<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> to <S%G5563>depart<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> <S%G4516>Rome.<s%> He <S%G4334>came<s%> to <S%G846>them,<s%>

<S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> he <S%G1511>practiced<s%> the same <S%G3673>trade,<s%> he <S%G3306>lived<s%> <S%G3844>with<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2038>worked,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> by <S%G5078>trade<s%> they were tent <S%G4635>makers.<s%>

<S%G1161>He<s%> <S%G1256>reasoned<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4864>synagogue<s%> <S%G2596><s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G4521>Sabbath,<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G3982>persuaded<s%> <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1672>Greeks.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G5613%G99999>when<s%> <S%G4609>Silas<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G5095>Timothy<s%> <S%G2718>came<s%> down <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G3109>Macedonia,<s%> <S%G3972>Paul<s%> was <S%G4912>compelled<s%> by the <S%G4151>Spirit,<s%> <S%G1263>testifying<s%> to the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> that <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> was the <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

<S%G1161>When<s%> they <S%G498>opposed<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G987>blasphemed,<s%> he <S%G1621>shook<s%> out his <S%G2440>clothing<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G846>them,<s%> <S%G5216>"Your<s%> <S%G129>blood<s%> be <S%G1909>on<s%> your <S%G5216>own<s%> <S%G2776>heads!<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> am <S%G2513>clean.<s%> <S%G575>From<s%> now <S%G3568>on,<s%> I will <S%G4198>go<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles!<s%>"

<S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G3327>departed<s%> <S%G1564>there,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> went <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3614>house<s%> of a <S%G5100>certain<s%> man <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G2459>Justus,<s%> one <S%G3739>who<s%> <S%G4576>worshiped<s%> <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3588>whose<s%> <S%G3614>house<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> next <S%G4927>door<s%> to the <S%G4864>synagogue.<s%>

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G2921>Crispus,<s%> the ruler of the <S%G752>synagogue,<s%> <S%G4100>believed<s%> in the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3624>house.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G4183>Many<s%> of the <S%G2881>Corinthians,<s%> when they <S%G191>heard,<s%> <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> were <S%G907>baptized.<s%>

<S%G2036>The<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3571>night<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> a <S%G3705>vision,<s%> <S%G3361>"Don't<s%> <S%G5399>be<s%> <S%G5399>afraid,<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2980>speak<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3361>don't<s%> <S%G4623>be<s%> <S%G4623>silent;<s%>

<S%G5037>He<s%> <S%G2523>lived<s%> there a <S%G1763>year<s%> <S%G5037>and<s%> <S%G1803>six<s%> <S%G3376>months,<s%> <S%G1321>teaching<s%> the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G846>them.<s%>

<S%G1161>But<s%> when <S%G1058>Gallio<s%> was <S%G445>proconsul<s%> of <S%G882>Achaia,<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> with one <S%G3661>accord<s%> <S%G2721>rose<s%> up against <S%G3972>Paul<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G71>brought<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1909>before<s%> the judgment <S%G968>seat,<s%>
<S%G3754>saying,<s%> <S%G3778>"This<s%> man <S%G374>persuades<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> to <S%G4576>worship<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> contrary <S%G3844>to<s%> the <S%G3551>law.<s%>"

<S%G1161>But<s%> when <S%G3972>Paul<s%> was <S%G3195>about<s%> to <S%G455>open<s%> his <S%G4750>mouth,<s%> <S%G1058>Gallio<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> <S%G3303>"If<s%> indeed it <S%G2258>were<s%> <S%G3767>a<s%> <S%G5100>matter<s%> <S%G5599>of<s%> <S%G92>wrong<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G5599>of<s%> <S%G4190>wicked<s%> <S%G2453>crime,<s%> you Jews, it would be <S%G3056>reasonable<s%> <S%G2596>that<s%> <S%G302>I<s%> should <S%G430>bear<s%> with <S%G5216>you;<s%>

<S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> they <S%G2076>are<s%> <S%G2213>questions<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G3056>words<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3686>names<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2596><s%> <S%G5209>your<s%> own <S%G3551>law,<s%> <S%G3700>look<s%> to it <S%G846>yourselves.<s%> <S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G3756>don't<s%> <S%G1014>want<s%> to <S%G1511>be<s%> a <S%G2923>judge<s%> of these <S%G5130>matters.<s%>"
<S%G2532>He<s%> <S%G556>drove<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the judgment <S%G968>seat.<s%>

<S%G1161>Then<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G1672>Greeks<s%> laid <S%G1949>hold<s%> on <S%G4988>Sosthenes,<s%> the ruler of the <S%G752>synagogue,<s%> and <S%G5180>beat<s%> him <S%G1715>before<s%> the judgment <S%G968>seat.<s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1058>Gallio<s%> <S%G3199>didn't<s%> care about <S%G3762>any<s%> of these <S%G5130>things.<s%>

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> having <S%G4357>stayed<s%> after this <S%G2425>many<s%> more <S%G2250>days,<s%> took his <S%G657>leave<s%> of the <S%G80>brothers,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> sailed from <S%G1602>there<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G4947>Syria,<s%> <S%G2532>together<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G846><s%> <S%G4252>Priscilla<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G207>Aquila.<s%> He <S%G2751>shaved<s%> his <S%G2776>head<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2747>Cenchreae,<s%> <S%G1063>for<s%> he <S%G2192>had<s%> a <S%G2171>vow.<s%>

<S%G1161>He<s%> <S%G2658>came<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2181>Ephesus,<s%> <S%G1161>and<s%> he left <S%G2641>them<s%> <S%G847>there;<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G1525>he<s%> <S%G846>himself<s%> <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4864>synagogue,<s%> and <S%G1256>reasoned<s%> with the <S%G2453>Jews.<s%>

<S%G1161>When<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G2065>asked<s%> him <S%G1909>to<s%> <S%G3306>stay<s%> <S%G3844>with<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> a <S%G4119>longer<s%> <S%G5550>time,<s%> <S%G1962>he<s%> <S%G3756>declined;<s%>

<S%G235>but<s%> <S%G657>taking<s%> his <S%G657>leave<s%> of <S%G846>them,<s%> and <S%G2036>saying,<s%> <S%G3165>"I<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> by all <S%G3843>means<s%> <S%G4160>keep<s%> this <S%G2064>coming<s%> <S%G1859>feast<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%G1161>but<s%> I will <S%G344>return<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G2309>if<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2309>wills,<s%>" <S%G2532>he<s%> set <S%G321>sail<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2181>Ephesus.<s%>

<S%G2532>When<s%> he had <S%G2718>landed<s%> <S%G1519>at<s%> <S%G2542>Caesarea,<s%> he went <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G782>greeted<s%> the <S%G1577>assembly,<s%> and went <S%G2597>down<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G490>Antioch.<s%>

<S%G2532>Having<s%> <S%G4160>spent<s%> <S%G5100>some<s%> <S%G5550>time<s%> <S%G1831>there,<s%> he departed, and went <S%G1330>through<s%> the <S%G5561>region<s%> of <S%G1054>Galatia,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5435>Phrygia,<s%> in <S%G2517>order,<s%> <S%G1991>establishing<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G3101>disciples.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> a <S%G5100>certain<s%> <S%G2453>Jew<s%> <S%G3686>named<s%> <S%G625>Apollos,<s%> an <S%G221>Alexandrian<s%> by <S%G1085>race,<s%> an <S%G3052>eloquent<s%> <S%G435>man,<s%> <S%G2658>came<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2181>Ephesus.<s%> <S%G5607>He<s%> was <S%G1415>mighty<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G1124>Scriptures.<s%>

This <S%G3778>man<s%> had <S%G2258>been<s%> <S%G2727>instructed<s%> in the <S%G3598>way<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord;<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> being <S%G2204>fervent<s%> in <S%G4151>spirit,<s%> he <S%G2980>spoke<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1321>taught<s%> <S%G199>accurately<s%> the <S%G3588>things<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> <S%G2962>Jesus,<s%> although he <S%G1987>knew<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%> the <S%G908>baptism<s%> of <S%G2491>John.<s%>

<S%G5037><s%> <S%G3778>He<s%> <S%G756>began<s%> to speak <S%G3955>boldly<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G1161>synagogue.<s%> But <S%G191>when<s%> <S%G4252>Priscilla<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G207>Aquila<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> they <S%G4355>took<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G4355>aside,<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1620>explained<s%> to <S%G846>him<s%> the <S%G3598>way<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> more <S%G199>accurately.<s%>

When <S%G846>he<s%> had <S%G1014>determined<s%> to <S%G1330>pass<s%> over <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G882>Achaia,<s%> the <S%G80>brothers<s%> <S%G4389>encouraged<s%> <S%G846>him,<s%> and <S%G1125>wrote<s%> to the <S%G3101>disciples<s%> to <S%G588>receive<s%> <S%G846>him.<s%> <S%G3739>When<s%> he had <S%G3854>come,<s%> he <S%G4183>greatly<s%> helped <S%G4820>those<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> had <S%G4100>believed<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G5485>grace;<s%>

<S%G1063>for<s%> he <S%G2159>powerfully<s%> <S%G1246>refuted<s%> the <S%G2453>Jews,<s%> <S%G1219>publicly<s%> <S%G1925>showing<s%> <S%G1223>by<s%> the <S%G1124>Scriptures<s%> <S%G1925>that<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1511>was<s%> the <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>
